segments.text: And so , that concludes my outline for our marketing strategy next year . Thank you very much for your time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , that was quite the presentation ! Honestly , I was completely blown away by your strategy outline . I've gotta say , Alex , you really wowed me today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Aw , come on , it was nothing . I'm just doing my job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I think you deserve some recognition here ; I mean , if I look back on your previous presentations , this is a huge improvement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , Kristin did give me a hand with the slides.She ' s a real wiz on PowerPoint .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I saw that you took on board my feedback about pricing strategies . I really appreciate you taking the time to think though my suggestions .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , well , that was some good advice . You made some really good points .
